PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-15972012-11-29,  ,  FIN,  ,  , 
ActCustoms Tariff
SubjectOrder Amending the Schedule to the Customs Tariff (Harmonized System Conversion, 2012-2)
PrecisOrder Amending the SCHEDULE TO THE CUSTOMS TARIFF (HARMONIZED SYSTEM CONVENTION, 2012-2) in order to (1) reflect new nomenclature amendments by the World Customs Organization (e.g. correct the scientific name of certain fish species); (2) correct minor technical errors; and (3) modify the product description of one tariff item (8452.90.10) and introduce another tariff item (8452.90.20) to ensure that certain parts for domestic sewing machines that were duty-free prior to the Harmonized Systeme change remain duty-free.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2012-0259 Publication Date: 2012-12-19
AttachmentsAttachment
